Constructor Detail

ConfigFile

public ConfigFile()
Creates a Config File class, which is used to access properties from config.properties and write properties to it. Webserver location, RPC location, Authorization key & guest viewers visibility are all maintained by this class.

Method Detail

getStaticWebServerRpcLocation

public static java.lang.String getStaticWebServerRpcLocation()
Static method to get the property of server RPC location of webwork.

Returns:
String value of the URL representing RPC location. If none on the config page, returns empty string.

getStaticWebServerLocation

public static java.lang.String getStaticWebServerLocation()
Static method to get the property of server SOAP location of webwork. This location should not be confused with the site URL location. This one is used to interact with the webservice.

Returns:
String representing web server location URL If none on the config page, returns empty string.

getStaticSoapAuthKey

public static java.lang.String getStaticSoapAuthKey()

Returns:
String representing Authorization Key used in webservice. If none on the config page, returns empty string.

getStaticWebServerSiteUrl

public static java.lang.String getStaticWebServerSiteUrl()
Static method to get the property webserver Site URL of the webwork. This is where the webwork assignments will be accessed.

Returns:
String representing the site url entered in the config page. If none on the config page, returns empty string.

getStaticWebworkCoursesSearchMethod

public static java.lang.String getStaticWebworkCoursesSearchMethod()
Static method to get the property of type of search method used in webwork. Usually three types of methods are available - Basic (Search on an admin / other specified course, for list of instructors of the course), Advanced - Search for a specified instructor permission level on the courses, None - List all courses.

Returns:
String representing

getStaticWebworkSearchCourse

public static java.lang.String getStaticWebworkSearchCourse()
Static method to get the property of search course. The course on which to search for instructors. Right now, the Admin is the this course, and every course in webwork has an entry in admin course as - 'Instructor_course'. Used for Basic search method.

Returns:
String representing

getStaticWebworkInstructorPermissionLevel

public static int getStaticWebworkInstructorPermissionLevel()
Static method to get the property of instructor permission level which needs to be checked for each course, for the search method of advanced. Right now a permission level of 10 is used, which is configuable with this variable.

Returns:
int representing permission level for instructor on a webwork course. Returns 10 by default, if none configured.
See Also:
getWebworkAssignmentPointFactor()

getStaticWebworkAssignmentPointFactor

public static int getStaticWebworkAssignmentPointFactor()
Static method to get the property assignment point factor. It determines the weightage of each problem section in webwork for the grade in blackboard. A Default of 1 is used in blackboard. This is configurable on global manner meaning, it affects the grading of all webwork courses used in blackboard.

Returns:
int representing assignment point factor / weightage used in blackboard. Returns by default 1.

getStaticWebworkDataSecurity

public static java.lang.String getStaticWebworkDataSecurity()
Static method to get the property of webwork data transmission encryption type.

Returns:
String value representing the encryption type for data transmission.

getWebServiceLocations

public static java.lang.String getWebServiceLocations(java.lang.String key)
Static method which is used as a generic method to get the property of web-service web-server properties - SOAP URL, RPC URL & webwork URL. Returns empty string if none of the three values.

Returns:
String representing

getRedirectUrl

public java.lang.String getRedirectUrl()
Gets the redirect location based on the success / failure of writing to a file / publish records. Accessed throughout the blackboard plugin. Proper location of the bean from which this method is being called should be set before trying to get the redirect URL. Right now config.jsp and publish.jsp pages uses this method.

Returns:
String representing the redirect URL to which the page should be redirected on the status.
See Also:
locationOfBean

setWebServerSiteUrl

public void setWebServerSiteUrl(java.lang.String webServerSiteUrl)
Bean set property, assigns the value to the webwork site URL variable from the user entered value in the config.jsp page. This is the actual location from which the webwork assignments are accessed from.

Parameters:
webServerSiteUrl - String value to set the webwork Server URL.

getWebServerSiteUrl

public java.lang.String getWebServerSiteUrl()
Bean's get property, retrieves the webwork site URL value from the config.properties file. If nothing is set in config page, then the default value of 'WebworkService.WebworkSiteUrl' property from messages.properties is fetched through 'constantWebworkSiteURL' variable. Returns the webwork site URL Location from the static method.

Returns:
the String value configured as the webwork site URL.
See Also:
getWebServiceLocations()

Bean's get property, retrieves the instructor permission level value from the config.properties file. setWebworkCoursesSearchMethod

public void setWebworkCoursesSearchMethod(java.lang.String webworkCoursesSearchMethod)
Bean set property, assigns the value to the courses search method variable from the user entered value in the config.jsp page. Right now only three types available - Basic, Advanced & None.

Parameters:
webworkCoursesSearchMethod - String value to be set through config.jsp page.

getWebworkCoursesSearchMethod

public java.lang.String getWebworkCoursesSearchMethod()
Bean's get property, retrieves the courses search method value from the config.properties file. If nothing is set in config page, then the default value of 'Advanced' is fetched from 'ConfigFile.Default.WebworkCoursesSearchMethod' in messages.properties through 'constantWebworkCoursesSearchMethod'

Returns:
String value configured for search type. Default is 'Advanced'. One of three values - 'Basic', 'Advanced', 'None'.

setWebworkDataSecurity

public void setWebworkDataSecurity(java.lang.String webworkDataSecurity)
Bean's set property, assigns the user selected value for data encryption type. Can be any one of the two - Hash / None.

Parameters:
webworkDataSecurity - String datatype. Right now only two types allowed within the plugin - Hash / None.

getWebworkDataSecurity

public java.lang.String getWebworkDataSecurity()
Bean's get property method to retrieve the data encryption type used within the plugin.

Returns:
the static webworkDataSecurity read from file.

setWebworkSearchCourse

public void setWebworkSearchCourse(java.lang.String webworkSearchCourse)
Bean set property, assigns the value to the search course variable from the user entered value in the config.jsp page. The default is 'admin'.

Parameters:
webworkSearchCourse - The String search course in webwork passed through config.jsp

getWebworkSearchCourse

public java.lang.String getWebworkSearchCourse()
Bean's get property, retrieves the search course value from the config.properties file. If nothing is set in config page, then the default value of 'admin' is fetched from 'ConfigFile.Default.WebworkSearchCourse' in messages.properties through 'constantWebworkSearchCourse'

Returns:
String value representing the search course configured.

setAllowGuestViewers

public void setAllowGuestViewers(boolean allowGuestViewers)
Bean set property, assigns the value to the allow guest viewers variable from the user entered value in the config.jsp page. The default is 'false'. Though this variable is configured in the admin page, it doesn't work the way it's expected. Future versions might have this implemented.

Parameters:
allowGuestViewers - boolean variable to be set through config.jsp page.

getAllowGuestViewers

public boolean getAllowGuestViewers()
Bean's get property, retrieves the allow guest viewers value from the config.properties file. If nothing is set in config page, then the default value of 'false' is fetched.

Returns:
the boolean value indicating if the guest are allowed to view the content.

setWriteServerProperty

public void setWriteServerProperty(boolean writeServerProperty)
Method which writes the properties captured from config.jsp page through request parameters to config.properties file. Sets the flag to the success of written information. When the information is written, the config file information is published to other classe's static variables. This way, when some one changes the config settings, the classes are synchronized to work with these changes.

Parameters:
writeServerProperty - Boolean flag to indicate to write changes to config.properties file.

getWriteServerProperty

public boolean getWriteServerProperty()
Bean's get property method, retrieving the flag info which indicates if the procedure of writing the properties to the file executed without any unexpected exceptions.

Returns:
boolean flag indicating if the server properties function executed without unexpected exception.

setServerPropertyWritten

public void setServerPropertyWritten(boolean serverPropertyWritten)
Bean's set property method, used to set the variable serverPropertyWritten, indicating success of writing all properties to the file, and that the properties are functioning fine with the web-service functions.

Parameters:
serverPropertyWritten - boolean value to write to the variable.

getServerPropertyWritten

public boolean getServerPropertyWritten()
Bean's get property method, retrieving the flag info which indicates if configuration entered by the user are fine for execution of building block.

Returns:
serverPropertyWritten boolean value indicating success of configuration.

requestUri - String value representing the Request URI.

setLocationOfBean

public void setLocationOfBean(java.lang.String locationOfBean)
Method to set the location of the bean from which the redirect page is to be retrieved.

Parameters:
locationOfBean - String value representing where the bean is accessed.
See Also:
getRedirectUrl()

getLocationOfBean

public java.lang.String getLocationOfBean()
Retrieves the locationOfBean variable representing the page from which this bean was accessed.

Returns:
String value representing where the bean is accessed.
See Also:
getRedirectUrl()

getSuccessLocation

public java.lang.String getSuccessLocation()
Retrieves the Request URL captured through request params in the config page. Used in the page redirection.

Returns:
the successLocation String value representing the location of page to redirect.
See Also:
getRedirectUrl()

setSuccessLocation

public void setSuccessLocation(java.lang.String successLocation)
Method to set the success location to redirect after success in the current page.

Parameters:
successLocation - Location of page to redirect. Set internally.
See Also:
getRedirectUrl()

setRedirectFailureMessage

public void setRedirectFailureMessage(java.lang.String redirectFailureMessage)
Method to set the redirect failure message. Usually called internally. Can be one among the 'BuildingBlockConstants.FailureMessages' messages in the messages.properties file, accessed through 'constantFailureMessages' variable.

Parameters:
redirectFailureMessage - String value representing the failure message.

getRedirectFailureMessage

public java.lang.String getRedirectFailureMessage()
Retrieves the redirect failure message. Can be one among the 'BuildingBlockConstants.FailureMessages' messages in the messages.properties file, accessed through 'constantFailureMessages' variable.

Returns:
String value representing the failure message.

setRedirectSuccessMessage

public void setRedirectSuccessMessage(java.lang.String redirectSuccessMessage)
Method to set the redirect success message. Usually called internally. Can be one among the 'BuildingBlockConstants.SuccessMessages' messages in the messages.properties file, accessed through 'constantSuccessMessages' variable.

Parameters:
redirectSuccessMessage - String value representing the success message.

getRedirectSuccessMessage

public java.lang.String getRedirectSuccessMessage()
Retrieves the redirect success message. Can be one among the 'BuildingBlockConstants.SuccessMessages' messages in the messages.properties file, accessed through 'constantSuccessMessages' variable.

Returns:
String value representing the success message.
